60 void test_results (geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& pos, geometry_msgs::Twist& vel, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& dir)
61 {
62  // EXPECT_EQ(ca_goal.header.seq, pos.header.seq);
63  // EXPECT_NEAR(ca_goal.header.stamp.toSec(), pos.header.stamp.toSec(), 0.001);
64  EXPECT_EQ(ca_goal.header.frame_id, pos.header.frame_id);
65  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_goal.pose.position.x, pos.pose.position.x, 0.001);
66  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_goal.pose.position.y, pos.pose.position.y, 0.001);
67  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_goal.pose.position.z, pos.pose.position.z, 0.001);
68  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_goal.pose.orientation.x, pos.pose.orientation.x, 0.001);
69  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_goal.pose.orientation.y, pos.pose.orientation.y, 0.001);
70  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_goal.pose.orientation.z, pos.pose.orientation.z, 0.001);
71  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_goal.pose.orientation.w, pos.pose.orientation.w, 0.001);
72 
73  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_vel.linear.x, vel.linear.x, 0.001);
74  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_vel.linear.y, vel.linear.y, 0.001);
75  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_vel.linear.z, vel.linear.z, 0.001);
76  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_vel.angular.x, vel.angular.x, 0.001);
77  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_vel.angular.y, vel.angular.y, 0.001);
78  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_vel.angular.z, vel.angular.z, 0.001);
79 
80  // EXPECT_EQ(ca_dir.header.seq, dir.header.seq);
81  // EXPECT_NEAR(ca_dir.header.stamp.toSec(), dir.header.stamp.toSec(), 0.001);
82  EXPECT_EQ(ca_dir.header.frame_id, dir.header.frame_id);
83  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_dir.pose.position.x, dir.pose.position.x, 0.001);
84  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_dir.pose.position.y, dir.pose.position.y, 0.001);
85  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_dir.pose.position.z, dir.pose.position.z, 0.001);
86  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_dir.pose.orientation.x, dir.pose.orientation.x, 0.001);
87  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_dir.pose.orientation.y, dir.pose.orientation.y, 0.001);
88  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_dir.pose.orientation.z, dir.pose.orientation.z, 0.001);
89  EXPECT_NEAR(ca_dir.pose.orientation.w, dir.pose.orientation.w, 0.001);
90 }
91 
95 void reset_results ()
96 {
97  ca_goal = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
98  ca_vel = geometry_msgs::Twist();
99  ca_dir = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
100 }
101 
105 TEST (NodeTestCollisionAvoidance, testPositionSetpoint)
106 {
107  NodeHandle nh;
108 
109  // create result objects
110  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
111  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
112  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
113 
114  // subscribers
115  Subscriber goal_subscriber = nh.subscribe("pos_controller/ca_goal_position", 1, goal_callback);
116  Subscriber vel_subscriber = nh.subscribe("vel_controller/ca_target_velocity", 1, vel_callback);
117  Subscriber dir_subscriber = nh.subscribe("collision_avoidance/direction", 1, dir_callback);
118 
119  // publish behavior state with collision avoidance
120  Publisher state_publisher = nh.advertise<std_msgs::String>("flexbe/behavior_update", 1, true); // latched
121  std_msgs::String state;
122  state.data = "foo";
123  state_publisher.publish(state);
124  Duration(1).sleep();
125 
126  // test collision avoidance result
127  spinOnce();
128  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
129 
130  // publish relative swarm position
131  Publisher swarm_publisher = nh.advertise<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>("swarm_position_rel", 1, true); // latched
132  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
133  agent.vector.magnitude = 8;
134  agent.vector.direction = M_PI / 2;
135  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
136  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
137  swarm_publisher.publish(swarm);
138  Duration(1).sleep();
139 
140  // test collision avoidance result
141  reset_results();
142  spinOnce();
143  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
144 
145  // publish empty position setpoint
146  Publisher sp_pos_publisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("pos_controller/goal_position", 1, true); // latched
147  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped sp_pos;
148  sp_pos_publisher.publish(sp_pos);
149  Duration(1).sleep();
150 
151  // test collision avoidance result
152  reset_results();
153  spinOnce();
154  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
155 
156  // publish empty position
157  Publisher pos_publisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("pos_provider/pose", 1, true); // latched
158  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
159  pos_publisher.publish(pose);
160  Duration(1).sleep();
161 
162  // test collision avoidance result
163  reset_results();
164  spinOnce();
165  pos.pose.position.y = -4;
166  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.707;
167  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707;
168  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
169 
170  // publish position setpoint
171  sp_pos.pose.position.x = -10;
172  sp_pos_publisher.publish(sp_pos);
173  Duration(1).sleep();
174 
175  // test collision avoidance result
176  reset_results();
177  spinOnce();
178  pos.pose.position.x = -4 / sqrt(2);
179  pos.pose.position.y = -4 / sqrt(2);
180  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.924;
181  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383;
182  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
183 
184  // publish behavior state without collision avoidance
185  state.data = "bar";
186  state_publisher.publish(state);
187  Duration(1).sleep();
188 
189  // test collision avoidance result
190  reset_results();
191  spinOnce();
192  pos = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
193  dir = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
194  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
195 
196  // publish behavior state with collision avoidance
197  state.data = "asdf";
198  state_publisher.publish(state);
199  Duration(1).sleep();
200 
201  // test collision avoidance result
202  reset_results();
203  spinOnce();
204  pos.pose.position.x = -4 / sqrt(2);
205  pos.pose.position.y = -4 / sqrt(2);
206  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.924;
207  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383;
208  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
209 }
210 
214 TEST (NodeTestCollisionAvoidance, testVelocitySetpoint)
215 {
216  NodeHandle nh;
217 
218  // create result objects
219  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
220  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
221  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
222 
223  // subscribers
224  Subscriber goal_subscriber = nh.subscribe("pos_controller/ca_goal_position", 1, goal_callback);
225  Subscriber vel_subscriber = nh.subscribe("vel_controller/ca_target_velocity", 1, vel_callback);
226  Subscriber dir_subscriber = nh.subscribe("collision_avoidance/direction", 1, dir_callback);
227 
228  // publish behavior state with collision avoidance
229  Publisher state_publisher = nh.advertise<std_msgs::String>("flexbe/behavior_update", 1, true); // latched
230  std_msgs::String state;
231  state.data = "foo";
232  state_publisher.publish(state);
233  Duration(1).sleep();
234 
235  // test collision avoidance result
236  reset_results();
237  spinOnce();
238  pos.pose.position.x = -4 / sqrt(2);
239  pos.pose.position.y = -4 / sqrt(2);
240  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.924;
241  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383;
242  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
243 
244  // publish relative swarm position
245  Publisher swarm_publisher = nh.advertise<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>("swarm_position_rel", 1, true); // latched
246  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
247  agent.vector.magnitude = 8;
248  agent.vector.direction = M_PI / 2;
249  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
250  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
251  swarm_publisher.publish(swarm);
252  Duration(1).sleep();
253 
254  // test collision avoidance result
255  reset_results();
256  spinOnce();
257  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
258 
259  // publish empty velocity setpoint
260  Publisher sp_vel_publisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("vel_controller/target_velocity", 1, true); // latched
261  geometry_msgs::Twist sp_vel;
262  sp_vel_publisher.publish(sp_vel);
263  Duration(1).sleep();
264 
265  // test collision avoidance result
266  reset_results();
267  spinOnce();
268  vel.linear.y = -4;
269  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.707;
270  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707;
271  test_results(pos, vel, dir); // old pos is still in the queue
272 
273  // publish empty position
274  Publisher pos_publisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("pos_provider/pose", 1, true); // latched
275  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
276  pos_publisher.publish(pose);
277  Duration(1).sleep();
278 
279  // test collision avoidance result
280  reset_results();
281  spinOnce();
282  pos = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped(); // old pos is now gone
283  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
284 
285  // publish velocity setpoint
286  sp_vel.linear.x = -1;
287  sp_vel_publisher.publish(sp_vel);
288  Duration(1).sleep();
289 
290  // test collision avoidance result
291  reset_results();
292  spinOnce();
293  vel.linear.x = -4 / sqrt(2);
294  vel.linear.y = -4 / sqrt(2);
295  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.924;
296  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383;
297  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
298 
299  // publish behavior state without collision avoidance
300  state.data = "bar";
301  state_publisher.publish(state);
302  Duration(1).sleep();
303 
304  // test collision avoidance result
305  reset_results();
306  spinOnce();
307  vel = geometry_msgs::Twist();
308  dir = geometry_msgs::PoseStamped();
309  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
310 
311  // publish behavior state with collision avoidance
312  state.data = "asdf";
313  state_publisher.publish(state);
314  Duration(1).sleep();
315 
316  // test collision avoidance result
317  reset_results();
318  spinOnce();
319  vel.linear.x = -4 / sqrt(2);
320  vel.linear.y = -4 / sqrt(2);
321  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.924;
322  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383;
323  test_results(pos, vel, dir);
324 }

332  return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
333 }
